com.bitplane.xt.util

Interface PixelSink<A>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - TODO ByteArray VolatileByteArray DirtyVolatileByteArray ShortArray VolatileShortArray DirtyVolatileShortArray FloatArray VolatileFloatArray DirtyVolatileFloatArray
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface PixelSink<A>
    Writing ArrayDataAccess as Imaris blocks
    Author:
    Tobias Pietzsch

    • Method Detail

      • put

        void put(A data,
         long[] min,
         int[] size)
  throws Imaris.Error
        Set sub-volume as flattened primitive array.
        Parameters:
        data - byte[], short[], float[], depending on dataset type.
        min - minimum of interval in Img space. Will be augmented to 5D if necessary.
        size - size of interval in Img space. Will be augmented to 5D if necessary.
        Throws:
        Imaris.Error
